AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: embassy clerk
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was one of the many clerks stationed in Maormer embassies. Most days were spent doing menial tasks, and enduring the hatred of the locals. But occasionally the embassy would be visited by diplomats, which usually meant a visit from assassins would follow shortly afterwards.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: embassy warden
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: As a battle hardened soldier looking for a slightly more relaxed life, guarding an embassy seemed like an obvious choice for [PAWN_nameDef]. Most days were usually fairly relaxing. Occasionally some locals would get a bit unruly, but they were usually swiftly escorted away. Sometimes though, someone would try to do something stupid. [PAWN_nameDef] enjoyed those days the most.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: embassy sentry
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] had spent quite some years as a scout, and knew all the signs that indicated someone unseen was approaching. So when [PAWN_pronoun] was offered work as a sentry at one of the embassies, getting paid to sit around in a tower all day, [PAWN_nameDef] accepted without hesitation.
